name: Kim The Spider
description:
This game was created for the Roguelike Jam 2 game jam, where we had 2 weeks to make a game that has roguelike or roguelite elements, and also followed the theme of "Web".

FUN FACT

  The name "Kim" was inspired by a jumping spider of the same name, that was trained by scientists to jump from platform to platform so that the strength of the spiders jump could be studied.  Jumping spiders don’t use their webs as sticky nets to catch prey like other spiders, but use them to swing around just like the spider in our game!

CREDITS

Artist - Abby Cali

Programmer - Jacob Moore

Composer - Jon R. Mohr

DOWNLOAD THE OST

You can download the OST here!

CHEAT CODES

  If you'd like to skip progression and just get straight to speedrunning the game, you can press "Numpad+" while controlling Kim to toggle all power ups on/off.
